title: Recently, a man named Michael Nobles was arrested in Pender County on charges of raping a young boy.  The bail set for him was 2.75 million dollars.  While I in NO way want to see him walking around on bond, I did wonder why the bail was set so high.  Is he a flight risk?
text:
Public safety reporter Brian Freskos is checking into your question.
I'll let you know what he finds out.
